mapper.select: select * from i4h9w_monthTrainProbBig where DATE_FORMAT( trainDate, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{trainDate} , '%Y%m' ) and dept =#{dept} order by createdTime desc limit 1
select * from i4h9w_monthTrainProbCen where DATE_FORMAT( trainDate, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{trainDate} , '%Y%m' ) and dept =#{dept} order by createdTime desc limit 1
